name: termcap
description:
This is the GNU termcap library, a library of C functions that enable
programs to send control strings to terminals in a way independent of
the terminal type.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependent_to.name: xterm
dependent_to.description:
The xterm program is a terminal emulator for the X Window System. It
provides DEC VT102 and Tektronix 4014 compatible terminals for programs
that can't use the window system directly.

dependent_to.name: openipmi
dependent_to.description:
The Open IPMI project aims to develop an open code base to allow access
to platform information using Intelligent Platform Management Interface
(IPMI).

dependent_to.name: ddd
dependent_to.description:
A graphical front-end for command-line debuggers such as GDB, DBX, WDB,
Ladebug, JDB, XDB, the Perl debugger, the bash debugger bashdb, the GNU
Make debugger remake, or the Python debugger pydb.

dependent_to.name: w3m
dependent_to.description:
w3m is a text-based web browser as well as a pager like `more' or
`less'. With w3m you can browse web pages through a terminal emulator
window (xterm, rxvt or something like that). Moreover, w3m can be used
as a text formatting tool which typesets HTML into plain text.
